sub_title: BIO & HEALTH TECH | DATA & A.I. | MECHANICS & MANUFACTURING | MARKETING & CREATION | SUSTAINABILITY
summary:
I am highly motivated, enthusiastic and have a great commercial drive. I eat, sleep and breathe strategy/marketing, and this is why I am up for any commercial challenge for any industry. 

Having experience in consumer relation management, consumer behavior, account management, marketing management and branding I am able help: my clients companies, my own companies to internationalize and my team to deliver what's expected from them. Due to my experience and passion for commercial economics/strategic business development I developed and increased my knowledge regarding marketing, brand management, brand loyalty / loyalty schemes, analytical performances and speak diverse languages. 

I enjoy working in this market for the commercial challenges and technical innovations where I can use my enthusiasm and creativity to build better consumer relations and expand brand loyalty.

profile_positions.title: CEO

profile_positions.description: Founded WSK Medical BV to innovate the Life Sciences & Health sector with AI solutions. The product vision has been materialised and known as Zeno AI for early cancer detection. Very proud of my dear friend Marius Wellenstein for his continues contribution and bringing our vision to the world.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description: Part of the Executive Board, I am leading the business development and implementation of the global business strategy with a focus on interactive packaging and innovation. I am leading the MagnaVersum App Services business based on my own concepts and vision and a strategic partner for the CEO/Chairman.
profile_positions.title: Chief Business Officer

profile_positions.description:
My vision is to initiate consumer engagement (AR and VR), anti-counterfeiting (authenticity check) combined with mobile technology.

My team offers digital solutions to help your organisation further into the digital age; from doing digital to being digital. We help you to take the leap and get ready for the latest technologies. I want to welcome you to the fourth industrial revolution. Executive responsibility for the resource planning for multiple development projects. 

I am working closely with my network at Unilever, PepsiCo, Coca-Cola, Perfetti van Melle, General Mills, D.E., Mondelez International, Mars, P&G, Nestle, Kellogg's, Johnson & Johnson, Beiersdorf, Red Bull, KLM-Air France, PlasticHeroes and many more to co-create a sustainable world utilizing patented technology.

Part of the MT/Board of MagnaVersum, I am leading the development and implementation of global business strategy with a focus on corporate sustainability, anti-counterfeiting, corporate marketing and innovation based on my own concepts. I am leading the marketing and sales department. Direct sparring partner for the CEO. Management of intellectual property and brand protection, organization of trade fairs, internal communication and company events also reside under my responsibility.
profile_positions.title: Chief Marketing Officer

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for setting up the base of what is commercially known as FiliGrade. Set up and created strategic partnerships that are still there today. Pushing for Circular Economy utilizing hidden markers in plastics.
Resource planning for several development projects was part of the day to day responsibilities.
profile_positions.title: Chief Sales Marketing Officer

profile_positions.description:
Clansman is a pioneer in online media with products like Test Exclusive and Basebuilder. These products will expand your consumer databases to ensure and establish one to one personalised communication which will lead to explosive sales.

Approaching new business and seeking out new opportunities will be a major part of my daily routine at Clansman. Meetings with existing clients and up selling or renewing contracts will also be part of the work load. As is the resource planning for multiple projects from design to deployment of the project.

Currently I am responsible for the FMCG sector where I achieve our objectives, sales increase and loyalty engagement for producers, via on-, in-pack and UTC promo campaigns. Setting up campaigns with and for Unilever, PepsiCo, Coca-Cola, Perfetti van Melle, General Mills, D.E., Mondelez International, Mars, P&G, Nestle, Kellogg's, Johnson & Johnson, Beiersdorf, Red Bull and many more.
profile_positions.title: Global Market Leader

profile_positions.description: As regional manager it’s a priority to maintain the flow of promotions in the FMCG (Fast Moving Consumer Goods) sector. To do so the job requires frequent visits to my clients. During these visits I am responsible for revenue increase for both Unilever and my client via increased awareness of promotions on the floor. Selling key merchandise is a priority to expand local market share which, in turn, will increase revenue for Unilever and my client. Next to sales it is important that NPD’s (New Product Distribution) find their way on the shelves and make clients enthusiastic about these new products. Also, it is important that Unilever keeps increasing market share which I can provide on the floor by increasing Share of Shelf (SOS) and by having close contact with HQ regarding agreements with retailer HQ. Next to the base work I help with building marketing cases as royalty programs and incentive programs.
profile_positions.title: Regional Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
For: Philips, Samsung, Panasonic and Ziggo

Product Demonstrations & Personnel Training. Based on these demonstrations a report should be made reflecting how the consumers and retail employees reacted. Next to the product demonstrations I did some merchandising and training where the employees of a certain franchise were trained and enthused about a certain innovative products. It’s also a priority, during my visit, to ensure that the Point of Sale material were displayed as supposed.
profile_positions.title: Trainer / Account Manager

profile_positions.location: Almere Stad Area, Netherlands - Lelystad, Netherlands
profile_positions.description: After being assigned to a certain district it’s my job to liaise and consult customers of and how to use the application Scoupy. It’s also a priority to approach new business and make them aware of Scoupy and how this is able to attract new customers.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description: As Sales Hunter it is a priority to boost the revenue for brands in the Unilever portfolio (OLA, B&J and Lipton Ice Tea). Cold calls and cold visits to provide new business are a daily routine as Sales Hunter.
